comment: Before I bought it, I had read many promising opinions. Initially it taste very sweet (too sweet?). I was little bit disappointed but finally my note is acceptable mainly taking into consideration the price. I prefer Highland Park 10Y and Connemara over Finlaggan but it may change. Definitely worth trying for reasonably price.
Very strong peat. Hits the tongue fast. And a bit of a bite at the end.
Very nice for the price! 20 eur for the bottle
